cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and shine so high, you see me during the day in the sky! What am I?
I'm round and white and shine at night, sometimes I'm full and big and bright! What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 People think I am made of cheese

cosmos.question: I am many bright lights, twinkling in the dark night! What are we?

hints.text: 🔭 You need a telescope to see us better.

cosmos.question: I am your home, a big round ball, where you play and stand up tall! What am I?
I'm a hot and fiery thing, but I'm not the sun, what could I be?

hints.text: 🔥 I burn up when I get to earth
🌠 I am also called a shooting star

cosmos.question: It's like a puzzle, but with stars, it makes a picture, near and far. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ People long ago used me to find their way.

cosmos.question: I'm big and twirly, full of stars, Earth is just a tiny part of us. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Our name makes you think of milk.

cosmos.question: I'm a rock that flies in space, sometimes near Earth at a fast pace! What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I can make a big crater if I hit Earth.
☄️ Some people think I killed the dinosaurs.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of planets going around the sun, Earth is one of us, it's lots of fun! What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ The planets revolve around our star
🚀 We can explore the system with rockets.

cosmos.question: I am a very large cloud in space made of gas and dust, new stars are born in this place. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I look very beautiful and colorful.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite food of monkeys!
🖐️ You need to peel my skin off.

food.question: I am red and round and grow on a tree. Sometimes I'm used to make juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 You can make juice with me.

food.question: I am long and orange and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?
I am white and cold, and you eat me with a spoon. I come in lots of flavors! What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 You need a spoon to eat me!

food.question: I am a small, green vegetable. I grow in a pod and you can eat me by themselves. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 I grow with many of my friends.

food.question: I am made from milk and I can be hard or soft. You can put me on sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.
🧀 I am often yellow or white.

food.question: I am round and orange and I have a lot of seeds inside. People carve me at Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 People make faces on me for Halloween.

food.question: I am made of dough and baked in an oven. I'm often sliced and eaten with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can put butter on me.
🔥 I am cooked in an oven.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have a lot of tiny, black seeds inside.
🟤 My skin is brown and fuzzy.

food.question: I am a yellow fruit, and my juice is very sour. What am I?

hints.text: 🍋 People sometimes put me in their drinks!
😖 My juice makes you pucker your lips.
